name: v1.2.9
body: The FoLiA library is being migrated out of PyNLPl to a new standalone project: https://github.com/proycon/foliapy (``pip install folia``), which is backward compatible with the one in pynlpl. Retaining the old library for a transition period, but implemented warnings and notices.

name: v1.2.8
body: * Enable proper confusion matrix in case of a dissimilarity between goals and observations #43

name: v1.2.7
body: * More insightful output on FoLiA text consistency errors

name: v1.2.6
body:
* Fix for FoLiA library (#41)
* Partial fix in FrogClient library (#38)

name: v1.2.5
body: * Minor folia fixes

name: v1.2.4
body: Minor bugfix release

name: v1.2.2
body: * FQL update, added ``[DELETE...] RESTORE ORIGINAL`` modifier

name: v1.2.1
body: * Fixed problem with text validation and text delimiters of sentences (#34)

name: v1.2
body:
* Updated FoLiA library for FoLiA v1.5
   * Implemented text validation (proycon/folia#24)
   * Added set aliases (#33, proycon/folia#31)
   * Implemented submetadata (proycon/folia#30)
   * Refactoring of metadata implementation, added ``ExternalMetadata`` class.
   * Fixes in parsing old inline IMDI

name: v1.1.11
body: * Support for FoLiA v1.4.3, implements ``textclass`` attribute

name: v1.1.10
body: Minor update to tie folia tests to correct FoLiA release (was missing in v1.1.9)

name: v1.1.9
body:
General:
* Restructured package (into a dedicated ``pynlpl`` subdir rather than root dir), removed patchy stuff from ``setup.py``
* Updated installation instructions
* Added ``pynlpl.algorithms.possiblesplits()``

FoLiA library:
* Updated for FoLiA v1.4.2
* Experimental text validation support
* always serialize XML with FoLiA version of library rather than FoLiA version from document; can't guarantee there are no changes
* ``text()`` method recurses in a semantically saner fashion

name: v1.1.8
body: Minor fix in syncing pynlpl-folia tests for premature v1.1.7 release

name: v1.1.7
body:
Minor update:
 * Fixes for Linebreak as text markup in  FoLiA library (#32)
 * Better support for multiple inheritance and ACCEPTED_DATA in FoLiA Library
 * Added ParseError exception in FoLiA Library, more detailed error feedback when loading invalid folia
 * Updated to FoLiA v1.4.1

name: v1.1.6
body: Minor bugfix release, fixes issue in folia library with underscores in NCName #31

name: v1.1.5
body: Minor update: output more details on FoLiA RelaxNG validation failure

name: v1.1.4
body: Bugfix release, fixes issue in folia library in declaration of new sets (#29)

name: v1.1.3
body:
Minor update:
- added class to perform evaluation of ordinal classification (by @fkunneman)

name: v1.1.2
body: Minor bugfix release, fixes issue in FQL

name: v1.1.1
body: Minor bugfix release, fixes `previous()`/`next()` method in FoLiA library (issue #26)

name: v1.1.0
body:
- Documentation fixes (also thanks to @irushchyshyn)
- Updated FoLiA library for FoLiA v1.4
  - Support for RDF-based FoLiA Set Definitions, split into a separate submodule now
    - Support for conversion of legacy XML sets to RDF
  - Support for deep validation (#19)
  - Numerous FQL fixes and enhancements: support for features, span roles, nested span annotations, SPAN statement

name: v1.0.9
body: Minor update release to fix tests

name: v1.0.8
body: - FoLiA v1.3.2 release (minor update regarding metadata, issue proycon/folia#23)

name: v1.0.7
body:
- FoLiA v1.3.1 support (minor update)
- handle escaped newlines (\n) in FQL (relates to issue proycon/flat#51) 
- minor FQL fixes
- Got rid of numpy dependency

name: v1.0.5
body:
- Minor update release, removed old examples.
- This version has been uploaded to Debian as well as `python-pynlpl` and `python3-pynlpl`

name: v1.0.4
body: Minor update: Ship test suite (v1.0.2 and v1.0.3 were wrong)

name: v1.0.3
body: Minor update: Ship test suite (v1.0.2 was wrong)

name: v1.0.2
body: Minor update: Ship tests in python package

name: v1.0.1
body: Minor fix release: FoLiA tests now reproducible for older versions

name: v1.0
body:
# FoLiA Library
- Update to FoLiA v1.3, consult the FoLiA 1.3 release notes 

# FQL Library
- Fix (issue #17)

name: v0.9.4
body: - Updated API Documentation, mostly in the FoLiA library

name: v0.9.3
body: - Bugfix release for FoLiA library, fixes issue #13

name: v0.9.2
body: Minor bugfix release for FoLiA library: v0.9.1 was released prematurely: `t-style` is a primary element. Fixed

name: v0.9.1
body: Bugfix release for FoLiA library. Fixes issue proycon/flat#33

name: v0.9.0
body:
## FoLiA library
- Support for FoLiA v1.2, consult FoLiA v1.2 release notes
- RelaxNG generation supports new `foreign-data` element and correctly ignores foreign namespace attributes.

## FQL Library
- Fixes for `SUGGESTION SPLIT/MERGE`

name: v0.8.2
body:
- Update to FoLiA v1.0.1
- generate_id is more flexible
- API documentation regenerated

name: v0.8.0
body:
## FoLiA library
- FoLiA v1.0.0 released
- FoLiA library is now largely constructed on the base of an external FoLiA specification (issue #9), property values have been revised significantly
- Added `AUTO_GENERATE_ID` property to indicate preference that an ID should be generated on an item
- Contains fixes in RelaxNG generation: `speech` element was missing,  legacy `listitem` was not supported.

## Frog client
- Fix for Python 3  (pull request #10)

name: v0.7.8
body: - Added ComplexAlignment support in FoLiA library

name: v0.7.7
body: First formal release on github
